name: Table
desc: A widget that uses the table layout algorithm for its children.

fields.name: columnWidths
fields.desc: How the horizontal extents of the columns of this table should be determined.

fields.name: defaultColumnWidth
fields.desc: How to determine with widths of columns that don't have an explicit sizing algorithm.

fields.name: textDirection
fields.desc: The direction in which the columns are ordered.

fields.name: border
fields.desc: The style to use when painting the boundary and interior divisions of the table.

fields.name: defaultVerticalAlignment
fields.desc: How cells that do not explicitly specify a vertical alignment are aligned vertically.

fields.name: textBaseline
fields.desc: The text baseline to use when aligning rows using [TableCellVerticalAlignment.baseline].
